title: Live Your Own Life
overview: Hyo Shim's Self-Reliance depicts the story of Hyo Shim, who has sacrificed her life for her family, starts to value herself and tries to lead an independent life. I want to consider what a relationship is, whether Simcheong's 'filial piety', which threw herself into Indangsu for Bongsa Shim, is still valid, and how to love the only family in the world more wisely and wisely.
